title: Drawing, Design for Rolling Serving Table with Three Trays, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Rolling Serving Table with Three Trays
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, below center: Bicycle; across right side of image: 27" 7; center of middle tray: 24" x 30; upper right corner, illegible inscription
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Trolley-like serving table on wheels in three-quarter view; three stacked trays, the middle one smaller; handles attached to back of uppermost tray; bottom tray has pair of bicycle wheels attached at front and pair smaller wheels attached at back; long "S"-shaped steering handle attached to lowest tray and extends to just below top tray.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Rolling Serving Table with Three Trays, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-61.
